services.title: Basics of Hairdressing
services.description: Study of haircut types, styling techniques, cutting methods, working with shape and volume. This is a foundational subject that builds core professional skills.

services.title: Hair Coloring and Color Theory
services.description: Covers color theory, shade selection, hair coloring techniques (ombre, shatush, balayage), mixing formulas, and working with chemical products safely and effectively.

services.title: Hygiene and Sanitation
services.description: A required subject that covers proper disinfection of tools, cleanliness of the workspace, and sanitary standards for serving clients.

services.title: Hairstyling and Creative Design
services.description: Focuses on formal, evening, bridal, and creative hairstyles. Students learn how to work with long hair, braiding, and styling with accessories.

services.title: Client Communication and Service Basics
services.description: Teaches communication skills, client psychology, etiquette, understanding customer requests, and how to create a welcoming, professional atmosphere during appointments.
